summary: TL*THE CONTACT OWNS A 2005 CHEVROLET US BUS STURDIBUS. THE CONTACT STATED THAT RECALL 06V443000, WHICH IS RELATED TO THE FRONT SEAT ASSEMBLY; HEAD RESTRAINTS WAS ISSUED ON NOVEMBER 20, 2009 AND THE MANUFACTURER HAD NOT REPAIRED THE VEHICLE. THESE BUSES ARE USED TO TRANSPORT SCHOOL CHILDREN AND THE CONTACT HAS HAD NO RESPONSE FROM THE MANUFACTURER. THE VIN AND THE MILEAGE WERE NOT AVAILABLE.
